Hi. When i try starting it, it says "Insert CD"! Im getting mad!!
one year aniversary.  no fix for the music problem...
Please help me with the "insert cd".

That game, can read as rayman-cd any music cd, and uses the sound data  from that into the game. That can help in both your problems. Just burn a music cd with the rayman sound tracks. You will not have the "incert cd" thing and you'll have music too.
